word_json: {"wordRank":3,"headWord":"sceptre","content":{"word":{"wordHead":"sceptre","wordId":"GRE_2_3","content":{"sentence":{"sentences":[{"sContent":"Therefore, let me go, for I must wander again over the world, and may not tarry here, though ye bring me the crown and the sceptre.","sContent_eng":"Therefore, let me go, for I must wander again over the world, and may not tarry here, though ye bring me the crown and the sceptre.","sSpeech":"Therefore%2C+let+me+go%2C+for+I+must+wander+again+over+the+world%2C+and+may+not+tarry+here%2C+though+ye+bring+me+the+crown+and+the+sceptre.&le=eng","sCn":"所以，让我走吧，我必须再次到处去寻找我的妈妈，我不能在这耽搁，尽管你们给我王冠和权杖。"}],"desc":"例句"},"usphone":"'sɛptɚ","syno":{"synos":[{"pos":"n","tran":"权杖；王权","hwds":[{"w":"crown"},{"w":"mace"}]}],"desc":"同近"},"ukphone":"'septə","ukspeech":"sceptre&type=1","star":0,"phone":"'septə","speech":"sceptre","relWord":{"rels":[{"pos":"n","words":[{"hwd":"scepter","tran":" 节杖（象征君权）；王权"}]},{"pos":"vt","words":[{"hwd":"scepter","tran":" 授予…王权；拥登王位（等于sceptre）"}]}],"desc":"同根"},"usspeech":"sceptre&type=2","trans":[{"tranCn":"笏, 节杖, 王权(=scepter)","descOther":"英释","descCn":"中释","pos":"n","tranOther":"a decorated stick carried by kings or queens at ceremonies"}]}}},"bookId":"GRE_2"}
